net.cassite.pure.ioc.handlers.param

Class DefaultParamHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cassite.style.Style
      • net.cassite.pure.ioc.IOCController
        • net.cassite.pure.ioc.handlers.param.DefaultParamHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParamAnnotationHandler

    public class DefaultParamHandler
extends IOCController
implements ParamAnnotationHandler
    Default implementation of ParamAnnotationHandler
    simply return the corresponding value of given parameter type.
    Author:
    wkgcass

      • canHandle

        public boolean canHandle(java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations)
        Description copied from interface: ParamAnnotationHandler
        one of given annotations can be handled
        Specified by:
        canHandle in interface ParamAnnotationHandler
        Parameters:
        annotations - a summary of annotations
        Returns:
        true if one of the annos can be handled, false otherwise.

      • handle

        public java.lang.Object handle(net.cassite.style.reflect.MemberSup<?> caller,
                               java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                               java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] toHandle,
                               ParamHandlerChain chain)
                        throws AnnotationHandlingException
        Description copied from interface: ParamAnnotationHandler
        retrieve an instance of given cls
        Specified by:
        handle in interface ParamAnnotationHandler
        Parameters:
        caller - the member calling for arguments
        cls - class of instance to retrieve
        toHandle - annotations
        chain - the Param Chain
        Usually call chain.next().handle(caller, cls, toHandle, chain) before do real handling.
        The next() handler may throw IrrelevantAnnotationHandlingException, it means the next() handler failed retrieving instance, and need current handler do handlings.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        AnnotationHandlingException
